content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple recovery updates focused on supplying a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for Automation Science Packs research; however, every attempt to place or craft a Lab failed. Although existing furnace entities were used (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron plate smelting and one at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper plate production), no structure built by the agent remains on the map.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Issues for get_entities  
 – Avoid passing unsupported arguments. Two different calls used either an unexpected keyword argument ('radius') or extra positional arguments, causing type errors. Verify the function’s signature and pass only the allowed arguments.

• Unchecked None Returns  
 – When operations return None (as seen when retrieving Lab entities), attempting to iterate over the result causes errors. Always check for None before iterating.

• Resource and Sub-Ingredient Shortages in Lab Crafting  
 – Lab crafting consistently failed due to missing sub-ingredients (for example, insufficient iron plates to produce iron-gear-wheels, or inadequate copper-plates leading to a shortfall in copper-cables and electronic circuits). Ensure that all prerequisite materials and crafting processes are in place before attempting Lab production.

• Lab Placement Inventory Check  
 – Errors indicating “No lab in inventory” led to failed placement attempts at (0.5, 2.5). Confirm that the Lab item is available in inventory prior to placement.
